title: Secrets from the Grave
description: In 1985, Scott Purk calls 911 to report that his pregnant wife, Meg Purk, has died by suicide. The case is closed until a suspicious house fire 24 years later leads police to question what really happened that day. Josh Mankiewicz reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
